<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_doc.LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Script that is used while processing or translating an artifact</description> <name>LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC</name> <script><![CDATA[var LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC = Class.create(); LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.LFArtifactProcessorSNC, { category: 'localization_framework', // DO NOT REMOVE THIS LINE!
/********** * Returns LFDocumentContent object for the given artifact record * * @param params.tableName The table name of the artifact record * @param params.sysId The sys-id of the artifact record * @param params.language Language into which the artifact has to be translated into (Target language) * @return LFDocumentContent object **********/ getTranslatableContent: function(params) { return new sn_doc.DocumentTemplateTranslationUtils().getDocumentContent(params); },
/********** * Uncomment the saveTranslatedContent function definition to write a custom save script * Stores translations into standard tables by default * * Optional Return * * @param documentContent LFDocumentContent object that can be parsed to obtain translated values * @return **********/ saveTranslatedContent: function(documentContent) { var targetId = new sn_doc.DocumentTemplateTranslationUtils().saveTranslation(documentContent);
return { "redirectToRecord": { "sysID": targetId, "tableName": 'sn_doc_template_block_content' } }; },
type: 'LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-17 04:46:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>39513d23e4883010f8778af1eb5a9d3b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>LFDocumentTemplateBlockContentProcessorSNC</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Document Templates" source="sn_doc">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Document Templates">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39513d23e4883010f8778af1eb5a9d3b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-18 10:25:37</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
